actions.name: Mimicry

cost.trigger: A [Terrain] is set or the user enters battle while a [Terrain] is active.

actions.description:
Trigger: A [Terrain] is set or the user enters battle while a [Terrain] is active.

Effect: The user gains the Type associated with the active [Terrain] as an extra Type, and the user's Physical- and Special-Category Attacks deal 25% more damage to creatures that possess that Type.

actions.name: Mimicry
actions.description: Passive: the user's Disguise and Stealth checks are two degrees more successful while the user is stationary.
